definition: used in polite request, give pleasure to or be pleasing to
details:
adverb
- used in polite request
= example: used in polite request
verb
- give pleasure to or be pleasing to
= example: give pleasure to or be pleasing to
= synonyms: delight
- give satisfaction
= example: give satisfaction
- be the will of or have the will to
= example: be the will of or have the will to
